hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path to #Morpha#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Red Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Flare Dancer atop the Fire Temple# guards a chest containing #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Epona's Song#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #like-like in Ganon's Shadow Trial# guards #Arrows (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Golden Gauntlets Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Blue Fire Bottle#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: Did you know that Barinade, Volvagia and Twinrova hard require the Boomerang, Megaton Hammer and Mirror Shield, respectively?
